tr_quotes.quote: Allah katında en aziz kul, intikama gücü yeterken affedendir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen affetmek cezalandırmaktan daha iyi sonuçlar verir
tr_quotes.author: Vladimir Bartol

tr_quotes.quote: Zayıf asla affedemez. Bağışmala, güçlünün niteliğidir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Affetmek ve unutmak iyi insanların intikamıdır
tr_quotes.author: Schiller

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse affettiği zaman olduğu kadar yükselemez.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: İlk özür dileyen en cesurdur, ilk affeden en güçlü, ilk unutan en mutlu
tr_quotes.author: Osho

tr_quotes.quote: Af insanlık dilinin en tatlı kelimesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Affetmekten daha ilahi bir şey olamaz
tr_quotes.author: G. E. Lessing

tr_quotes.quote: İntikam alıp da sonunda pişman olmaktansa affedip de pişman olmak daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Cafer B. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Kaybettiysen ara, kırdıysan af dile, kırıldıysan affet; çünkü hayat çok kısa.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Zihninden zararsızca geçip gidebiliyorsa, o insanı affetmişsin demektir
tr_quotes.author: Karyl Huntley

tr_quotes.quote: İntikam arzusu, normalde iyileşecek yaraların açık kalmasına neden olur.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi biraz rahat bırakırsanız biraz huzurunuz olacaktır, daha çok rahat bırakırsanız daha çok huzurunuz olacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi sevin, kabul edin, bağışlayın. Kendinize iyi davranın, çünkü siz olmadan geri kalanımız birçok güzel şeyin kaynağından mahrum kalacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Leo F. Buscaglia

tr_quotes.quote: Anlamlı olmadıkça özrün, özür olmadığını hatırlamalıyız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Asla bir özrü bahane ile mahvetmeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Kimberly Howard

tr_quotes.quote: Zayıflar affedemez. Affetmek güçlülerin özelliğidir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanı güçlü kılan, bazı insanların düşündüğü gibi elinde tutmak değil, bazen de bırakmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bağışlamak, bir mahkumu serbest bırakmak ve asıl mahkumun kendiniz olduğunu fark etmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

tr_quotes.quote: Bağışlamak, intikam hakkını Allah'a bırakmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bağışlamak geçmişi değiştirmez ama geleceği genişletir.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Boese

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarından nezaket beklemeden önce kendinize nazik olun.
tr_quotes.author: Lama Yeshe

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şeyi yargılama, mutlu olursun. Her şeyi affet, daha mutlu olursun. Her şeyi sev, en mutlu sen olursun.
tr_quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini suçladığında, öğrenirsin. Başka birini suçlarsan hiçbir şey öğrenemezsin; çünkü bu senin suçun değil, onun suçudur.
tr_quotes.author: Joe Strummer

tr_quotes.quote: Bir an bekle, arkana dön ve unuttuklarını anımsa. Kaybettiysen ara, kırdıysan af dile, kırıldıysan affet; çünkü hayat çok kısa.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Cömertliğin üç belirtisi vardır: Sözünün eri olmak, gereksiz yere övünmemek ve sorgusuz sualsiz bağışlamak.
tr_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

tr_quotes.quote: Öfkelenmek beşeri bir olaydır, fakat bilahare sakinleşmemek ve affetmemek ayıplanacak iğrenç bir harekettir.
tr_quotes.author: François de Sales

tr_quotes.quote: Düşmanına zarar vermek; seni ondan daha küçük yapar, intikam almak; onunla aynı düzeye getirir, affetmek; ondan üstün yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Affetmenin ne olduğunu yalnız cesurlar bilir, korkakların tabiatında af diye bir şey yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

tr_quotes.quote: En anlamlı yemin söz vermektir, en büyük intikam affetmektir, en adi söz hiç sevmedim demek; ve en güzel cevap gülüp geçmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: En çok üç șey yorar insanı; affetmek, içi yanarken susmak ve olmayacağını bildiği halde hayal kurmak.
tr_quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

tr_quotes.quote: Attığınız tokata karşılık vermeyen kişiden sakının, o hem sizi bağışlamaz hem de kendinizi bağışlamanıza olanak bırakmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarını affedemeyenler, kendilerinin geçmek zorunda kalacağı köprüyü yıkarlar.
tr_quotes.author: George Herbert

tr_quotes.quote: Bağışlama, menekşenin kendini ezen topuğa, anında bulaşan güzel kokusudur.
tr_quotes.author: George Roemisch

tr_quotes.quote: Affedebilmek güçlülere mahsustur.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Affederim ama unutmam demek, affetmem demenin bir yoludur. Affetmek bir daha kimseye gösterilmemek üzere yırtılıp yakılan not parçası gibi olmalı.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecger

tr_quotes.quote: Zihninden zararsızca geçip gidebiliyorsa, o insanı affetmişsin demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Karyl Huntley

tr_quotes.quote: Kendimizin de affedilmeye ihtiyacımız olduğunu hatırlayarak daima affetmeliyiz. Affetmemiz gerekenden çok daha fazla kez affedilmemiz gerekir çünkü.
tr_quotes.author: Papa John Paul II

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızca zayıﬂar öç peşinde koşarlar. Ruhu güçlü olan bağışlayıcıdır ve bağışlamak, zarar görenin onurudur.
tr_quotes.author: Halil Cibran

tr_quotes.quote: Suçlu olsa dahi bir insanı bağışlamak, ona sevgi dolu, dostça sözler söylemek işinizden ve zenginliğinizden daha yüce bir duygudur.
tr_quotes.author: Anton Çehov

tr_quotes.quote: Affetmek, geriye dönük değil, güzel günlere inanmanın iyimserliğiyle ileriye dönük atılmış bir düğüm gibidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer birisi sizi kırarsa, bunu unutabilirsiniz ama, siz birisini kırarsanız, bunu her zaman hatırlarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insan size yanlış yaptığında, bunu fark etmemiş gibi davranın. Bunu not ederler ve size uzun süre borçlu kalmazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: İntikam arzusu, normalde iyileşecek yaraların açık kalmasına neden olur.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Affetmek, geçmişi değiştirmez ama, geleceğin önünü açar.
tr_quotes.author: Paule Boese

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi, kusurlarınız ve hatalarınız için affedin ve yaşamınıza devam edin.
tr_quotes.author: Les Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Affetmek güçlüyü daha güçlü yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

tr_quotes.quote: Affetmek bir hediyedir. Hem affedilen hem kendiniz için. Ama hiç kimse hazır olmadıkça hediye veremez.
tr_quotes.author: Sarah Jio

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarının affetmek, zihinsel huzur ve sağlık için gereklidir. Eğer sağlıklı ve mutlu olmak istiyorsanız, sizi incitmiş olan herkesi affetmelisiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Murphy

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini içinde bağışlamak, geçmişi , içindeki bütün safralarıyla yeni baştan değiştirecek güce sahip olmak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Stefano E. D’Anna

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini affetmeyen bir kimsenin bütün kusurları affedilebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyus

tr_quotes.quote: İmanın gerçek gizemi bağışlamak değil bağışlanmayı istemektir; dünyayı olduğu gibi kabullenmeliyiz, çünkü onu değiştirmeyi bilmiyoruz.
tr_quotes.author: Jean-Christophe Grangé

tr_quotes.quote: Bir düşmanı affetmek, bir dostu affetmekten daha kolaydır.
tr_quotes.author: Dorothe Deluzy

tr_quotes.quote: Samimi bir şekilde ve hüsnüniyetle kayıtsız şartsız affetmek, insan severliğin en esaslı mihenk taşıdır.
tr_quotes.author: P.A.Bourdalone

tr_quotes.quote: Yanılmak insanca, bağışlamak kutsalca bir iştir.
tr_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

tr_quotes.quote: Yanlış hareket etmek insanlara, bağışlamaksa Allah’a aittir.
tr_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

tr_quotes.quote: Affetmek büyüklüktür, bunda anlatması çok güç bir zevk vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Beydeba

tr_quotes.quote: Düşmanına galebe çaldığın zaman onu affet, zaferinin şükrünü eda etmiş olursun.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali (r.a.)

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların en cömerdi istemeden veren, intikama gücü yeterken bağışlayandır.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Hüseyin (r.a.)

tr_quotes.quote: Affetmek kendime verdiğim en büyük armağandır, ben affediyorum ve kendimi özgür bırakıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Louise L. Hay

tr_quotes.quote: Erdem bir kötülüğü yapmamak değil, yapılmış kötülüğü bağışlamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse, affettiği zaman olduğu kadar yükselemez.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer düşmanlarımızın gizli geçmişlerini okuyabilmiş olsaydık, düşmanca duygularımızı sona erdirecek kadar acı ve ıstırap bulabilirdik.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Longfellow

tr_quotes.quote: Düşmanlarınızı bağışlayın, hiçbir şey onların canını bu derece sıkmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Düşmanlarınızı affedin bu bir büyüklüktür.
tr_quotes.author: S. J. Kennedy

tr_quotes.quote: İyi de affa değer olanı zaten herkes affeder. Asıl af, affa lâyık olmayanı da affetmek değil mi?
tr_quotes.author: Nazan Bekiroğlu

en_quotes.quote: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: The stupid neither forgive nor forget; the naive forgive and forget; the wise forgive but do not forget
en_quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

en_quotes.quote: We think that forgiveness is weakness, but it's absolutely not; it takes a very strong person to forgive
en_quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Man has two great spiritual needs. One is for forgiveness. The other is for goodness
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness isn't just a blessing you deliver to another human being. Forgiveness is also a gift you give yourself
en_quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

en_quotes.quote: To err is human; to forgive, divine
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: There is no revenge so complete as forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: It's one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself, to forgive. Forgive everybody
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is for yourself because it frees you. It lets you out of that prison you put yourself in
en_quotes.author: Louise L. Hay

en_quotes.quote: Forgive me my nonsense, as I also forgive the nonsense of those that think they talk sense
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone
en_quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

en_quotes.quote: Acceptance and tolerance and forgiveness, those are life-altering lessons
en_quotes.author: Jessica Lange

en_quotes.quote: Children begin by loving their parents; after a time they judge them; rarely, if ever, do they forgive them
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom
en_quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

en_quotes.quote: A winner rebukes and forgives; a loser is too timid to rebuke and too petty to forgive
en_quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

en_quotes.quote: One of the secrets of a long and fruitful life is to forgive everybody everything everynight before you go to bed
en_quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

en_quotes.quote: I invite everyone to chose forgiveness rather than division, teamwork over personal ambition
en_quotes.author: Jean-Francois Cope

en_quotes.quote: I find forgiveness to be really healthy
en_quotes.author: Ben Affleck

en_quotes.quote: Love in the real world means saying you're sorry 10 times a day
en_quotes.author: Kathie Lee Gifford

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is a funny thing. It warms the heart and cools the sting
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: Sweet mercy is nobility's true badge
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you
en_quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

en_quotes.quote: Life is life. You have to learn how to forgive people and how to gain forgiveness for yourself
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Clementine

en_quotes.quote: Beware of the man who does not return your blow: he neither forgives you nor allows you to forgive yourself
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Any story about revenge is ultimately a story about forgiveness, redemption, or the futility of revenge
en_quotes.author: Nick Wechsler

en_quotes.quote: He that cannot forgive others breaks the bridge over which he must pass himself; for every man has need to be forgiven
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: The characteristics of an authentically empowered personality are humbleness, clarity, forgiveness and love
en_quotes.author: Gary Zukav

en_quotes.quote: I think it is important that we rebuild an atmosphere of forgiveness and civility in every aspect of our lives
en_quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

en_quotes.quote: The ineffable joy of forgiving and being forgiven forms an ecstasy that might well arouse the envy of the gods
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Without forgiveness life is governed by... an endless cycle of resentment and retaliation
en_quotes.author: Roberto Assagioli

en_quotes.quote: Choosing forgiveness opens the door of your heart and makes way for a miracle in your life
en_quotes.author: Victoria Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Forgive those who have hurt you
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: I see the good in people, and I believe in forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Karrueche Tran

en_quotes.quote: When a deep injury is done us, we never recover until we forgive
en_quotes.author: Alan Paton

en_quotes.quote: It is in pardoning that we are pardoned
en_quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: When you are happy you can forgive a great deal
en_quotes.author: Princess Diana

en_quotes.quote: If there is something to pardon in everything, there is also something to condemn
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: The lesson is that you can still make mistakes and be forgiven
en_quotes.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is a virtue of the brave
en_quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Sins cannot be undone, only forgiven
en_quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

en_quotes.quote: We win by tenderness. We conquer by forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Frederick William Robertson

en_quotes.quote: Forgive many things in others; nothing in yourself
en_quotes.author: Ausonius

en_quotes.quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit
en_quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

en_quotes.quote: Can you really forgive if you can't forget?
en_quotes.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

en_quotes.quote: It is always the case that when the Christian looks back, he is looking at the forgiveness of sins
en_quotes.author: Karl Barth

en_quotes.quote: I shall be an autocrat: that's my trade. And the good Lord will forgive me: that's his
en_quotes.author: Catherine the Great

en_quotes.quote: Reversing your treatment of the man you have wronged is better than asking his forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: There is no forgiveness, justice, or healing on any level when hate is involved
en_quotes.author: KRS-One

en_quotes.quote: To me, forgiveness is the cornerstone of healing
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Fraser

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is about empowering yourself, rather than empowering your past
en_quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

en_quotes.quote: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the final form of love
en_quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

en_quotes.quote: Forgive, forget. Bear with the faults of others as you would have them bear with yours
en_quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

en_quotes.quote: Forgive, O Lord, my little jokes on Thee, and I'll forgive Thy great big joke on me
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the needle that knows how to mend
en_quotes.author: Jewel

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is an act of the will, and the will can function regardless of the temperature of the heart
en_quotes.author: Corrie Ten Boom

en_quotes.quote: The first step in forgiveness is the willingness to forgive
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: Thankfully, forgiveness, and the healing it brings in its wake, has nothing to do with 'deserve.'
en_quotes.author: Eric Metaxas

en_quotes.quote: Only the brave know how to forgive... a coward never forgave; it is not in his nature
en_quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

en_quotes.quote: I really do believe that God is love, one of deep affection and grace and forgiveness and inspiration
en_quotes.author: William P. Young

en_quotes.quote: Nothing inspires forgiveness quite like revenge
en_quotes.author: Scott Adams

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is God's command
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: I thank the Lord for the great principle of repentance and forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness means letting go of the past
en_quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

en_quotes.quote: The only thing I've settled in my mind is that I want to forgive, and forgiveness comes with forgetting
en_quotes.author: Ingrid Betancourt

en_quotes.quote: Every year during their High Holy Days, the Jewish community reminds us all of our need for repentance and forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: For me, the healing process starts with graciousness and forgiveness
en_quotes.author: India Arie

en_quotes.quote: Forgotten is forgiven
en_quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

en_quotes.quote: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: God pardons like a mother, who kisses the offense into everlasting forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: In order to have understanding, you need forgiveness, compassion, and empathy
en_quotes.author: Rooney Mara

en_quotes.quote: God may forgive your sins, but your nervous system won't
en_quotes.author: Alfred Korzybski

en_quotes.quote: Life is an adventure in forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: Before we can forgive one another, we have to understand one another
en_quotes.author: Emma Goldman

en_quotes.quote: We are not forgiven because we are good. We are forgiven because Christ bore our sins
en_quotes.author: Joseph Prince

en_quotes.quote: My parents are very good examples of Christians. They are big on forgiveness
en_quotes.author: James Acaster

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the redemptive need to admit mistakes, express regret, and ask for forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Ana Navarro

en_quotes.quote: There is no forgiveness in nature
en_quotes.author: Ugo Betti

en_quotes.quote: It is often easier to ask for forgiveness than to ask for permission
en_quotes.author: Grace Hopper

en_quotes.quote: We all know in our hearts that forgiveness is the right thing; it's just a matter of being inspired to reach that place
en_quotes.author: Nazanin Boniadi

en_quotes.quote: A mistake is always forgivable, rarely excusable and always unacceptable
en_quotes.author: Robert Fripp

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness to the injured does belong; but they ne'er pardon who have done wrong
en_quotes.author: John Dryden

en_quotes.quote: How unhappy is he who cannot forgive himself
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: Humanity is never so beautiful as when praying for forgiveness, or else forgiving another
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: Soon I realized that if beauty equalled forgiveness, I was never going to be forgiven
en_quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

en_quotes.quote: I deepen my experience of God through prayer, meditation, and forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the giving, and so the receiving, of life
en_quotes.author: George MacDonald

en_quotes.quote: The ability to forgive is one of man's greatest achievements
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: The power of forgiveness transcends personal relationships
en_quotes.author: Eric Metaxas

en_quotes.quote: I think it's important to remember that Christianity was based in love and tolerance and forgiveness and acceptance
en_quotes.author: Kristin Chenoweth

en_quotes.quote: To understand is to forgive, even oneself
en_quotes.author: Alexander Chase

en_quotes.quote: I am making amends and seeking forgiveness. My only hope is that some good can come out of my situation
en_quotes.author: Jayson Blair

en_quotes.quote: There is freedom in forgiveness, and it's not that hard to do once you get into the habit
en_quotes.author: Dana Perino

en_quotes.quote: You have to work on forgiveness and love, and that includes your own self
en_quotes.author: Brian Welch

en_quotes.quote: To understand somebody else as a human being, I think, is about as close to real forgiveness as one can get
en_quotes.author: David Small

en_quotes.quote: What is forgiven is usually well remembered
en_quotes.author: Louis Dudek

en_quotes.quote: To my younger self, I would say unless you're literally in danger, ask forgiveness instead of asking permission
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Van Ness

en_quotes.quote: One forgives to the degree that one loves
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: We often forgive those who bore us, but we cannot forgive those whom we bore
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Forgive, son; men are men; they needs must err
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the forgiveness of sin and the redemption of ignorance
en_quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

en_quotes.quote: If I owe Smith ten dollars and God forgives me, that doesn't pay Smith
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness has an uncanny way of bringing incredible good out of incredibly bad situations
en_quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

en_quotes.quote: I clearly have done things that were wrong. I've clearly had to seek God's forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

en_quotes.quote: To confer dignity, forgive. To express contempt, forget
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is like faith. You have to keep reviving it
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: I am 100% in the camp that says forgiveness is mostly about the forgiver
en_quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

en_quotes.quote: I believe in forgiveness; I believe in trying to work with people
en_quotes.author: John Lewis

en_quotes.quote: God will forgive me. It's his job
en_quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

en_quotes.quote: As we know, forgiveness of oneself is the hardest of all the forgivenesses
en_quotes.author: Joan Baez

en_quotes.quote: Knowing that you are completely forgiven destroys the power of sin in your life
en_quotes.author: Joseph Prince

en_quotes.quote: On the Day of Atonement, Jews are commanded to seek forgiveness from the people we have hurt
en_quotes.author: Laura Schlessinger

en_quotes.quote: We need Grace and forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

en_quotes.quote: God forgives those who invent what they need
en_quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

en_quotes.quote: I never forgive, but I always forget
en_quotes.author: Arthur Balfour

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness allowed me to wash my burdened past away
en_quotes.author: Clemantine Wamariya

en_quotes.quote: Never does the human soul appear so strong as when it foregoes revenge and dares to forgive an injury
en_quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is a gift you give yourself
en_quotes.author: Suzanne Somers

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness really is so misunderstood, as well as the power it can release in an individual
en_quotes.author: Jennifer O'Neill

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness isn't about condoning what has happened to you or someone else's actions against you
en_quotes.author: Jennifer O'Neill

en_quotes.quote: I think forgiveness is overrated, personally, because some things people do are unforgivable
en_quotes.author: Charlamagne tha God

en_quotes.quote: The power of forgiveness is huge; it is really big, and it can save this world
en_quotes.author: Immaculee Ilibagiza

en_quotes.quote: The fact is there is forgiveness for those who seek God. And I believe in the power of redemption
en_quotes.author: Rick Perry

en_quotes.quote: I would say the hierarchy has made terrible errors in judgment and it has to seek forgiveness by its members
en_quotes.author: William P. Leahy

en_quotes.quote: To sin offers repentance and forgiveness; not to sin offers only punishment
en_quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is not to give the other person peace. Forgiveness is for you. Take that opportunity
en_quotes.author: Mackenzie Phillips

en_quotes.quote: I'm currently in an interesting correspondence with a nun about forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Julian Clary

en_quotes.quote: Asking for forgiveness is just one of the most painful kind of experiences
en_quotes.author: Nick Nolte

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness in any aspect of something that is complex is the greatest tool
en_quotes.author: Kate Hudson

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is hard for me, man. It is for most American-Western males. It's a sign of weakness
en_quotes.author: Art Alexakis

en_quotes.quote: My desire is to be a forgiving, non-judgmental person
en_quotes.author: Janine Turner

en_quotes.quote: My desire is to stand up and brush myself off when I make mistakes and ask for forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Janine Turner

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness takes time. It is the last step of the grieving process
en_quotes.author: Elin Nordegren

en_quotes.quote: Do you ever achieve total forgiveness after screwing up?
en_quotes.author: Lee Unkrich

en_quotes.quote: The films of which I'm most proud I've written are the ones that pivot on forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Peter Morgan

en_quotes.quote: I believe forgiveness is possible for everybody, for everything, but I'm a Buddhist
en_quotes.author: Alan Ball

en_quotes.quote: We have to look at loan forgiveness to incentivise young people to pursue degrees in areas where we know we need help
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Esty

en_quotes.quote: I think one of the most important things in evolving is forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Damon Dash

en_quotes.quote: I learned about forgiveness, and I've reached out to others to make amends
en_quotes.author: Beth Hart

en_quotes.quote: I believe in forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Pam Bondi

en_quotes.quote: I think there are different levels of forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Catherine Oxenberg

en_quotes.quote: We only learn at the speed of pain, and we don't have others in our lives without forgiveness
en_quotes.author: Bill Clegg

en_quotes.quote: When there's that forgiveness present and compassion, it just helps you live so much easier
en_quotes.author: Craig T. Nelson

en_quotes.quote: The forgiveness that comes of patient interpretation seems impossible when those nearest to your heart are threatened
en_quotes.author: Giles Foden

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is indifference. Forgiveness is impossible while love lasts
en_quotes.author: Mary Boykin Chesnut

en_quotes.quote: It's far easier to forgive an enemy after you've got even with him
en_quotes.author: Olin Miller

en_quotes.quote: I think we learn the most from imperfect relationships - things like forgiveness and compassion
en_quotes.author: Andrea Thompson

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
en_quotes.author: Paul Boose

en_quotes.quote: The act of forgiveness takes place in our own mind. It really has nothing to do with the other person.
en_quotes.author: Louise Hay

en_quotes.quote: Always forgive your enemies – nothing annoys them so much.
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: We read that we ought to forgive our enemies; but we do not read that we ought to forgive our friends.
en_quotes.author: Sir. Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Most of us can forgive and forget; we just don't want the other person to forget that we forgave.
en_quotes.author: Ivern Ball

en_quotes.quote: To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness.
en_quotes.author: Robert Muller

en_quotes.quote: Not forgiving is like drinking rat poison and then waiting for the rat to die.
en_quotes.author: Anne Lamott

en_quotes.quote: Before we can forgive one another, we have to understand one another.
en_quotes.author: Emma Goldman

en_quotes.quote: Let us forgive each other – only then will we live in peace.
en_quotes.author: Leo Nikolaevich Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: True forgiveness is when you can say, “Thank you for that experience.
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Once a woman has forgiven her man, she must not reheat his sins for breakfast.
en_quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is a sign that the person who has wronged you means more to you than the wrong they have dealt.
en_quotes.author: Ben Greenhalgh

en_quotes.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.”
en_quotes.author: Will Smith

en_quotes.quote: The stupid neither forgive nor forget; the naive forgive and forget; the wise forgive but do not forget.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

en_quotes.quote: A happy marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
en_quotes.author: Robert Quillen

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness isn’t approving what happened. It’s choosing to rise above it.
en_quotes.author: Robin Sharma

en_quotes.quote: If you can’t forgive and forget, pick one.
en_quotes.author: Robert Brault

en_quotes.quote: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: To be wronged is nothing, unless you continue to remember it.
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Resentment is like drinking poison and then hoping it will kill your enemies.
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
Without forgiveness life is governed by an endless cycle of resentment and retaliation.
en_quotes.author: Roberto Assagioli

en_quotes.quote: Be the one who nurtures and builds. Be the one who has an understanding and a forgiving heart one who looks for the best in people. Leave people better than you found them.
en_quotes.author: Marvin J. Ashton

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the sweetest revenge.
en_quotes.author: Isaac Friedmann

en_quotes.quote: True forgiveness is not an action after the fact, it is an attitude with which you enter each moment.
en_quotes.author: David Ridge

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is a gift you give yourself.
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is like faith. You have to keep reviving it.
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
en_quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: I have always found that mercy bears richer fruits than strict justice.
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: A broken friendship that is mended through forgiveness can be even stronger than it once was.
en_quotes.author: Stephen Richards

en_quotes.quote: Anger makes you smaller, while forgiveness forces you to grow beyond what you were.
en_quotes.author: Cherie Carter-Scott

en_quotes.quote: To err is human, to forgive, divine.
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is a funny thing. It warms the heart and cools the sting.
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

en_quotes.quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the key to inner peace because it is the mental technique by which our thoughts are transformed from fear to love.
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: As I walked out the door toward the gate that would lead to my freedom, I knew if I didn't leave my bitterness and hatred behind, I'd still be in prison.
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: Letting go doesn’t mean that you don’t care about someone anymore. It’s just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
en_quotes.author: Deborah Reber

en_quotes.quote: As long as you don’t forgive, who and whatever it is will occupy a rent-free space in your mind.
en_quotes.author: Isabelle Holland

en_quotes.quote: Laughter gives us distance. It allows us to step back from an event, deal with it and then move on.
en_quotes.author: Bob Newhart

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the giving, and so the receiving, of life.
en_quotes.author: George MacDonald

en_quotes.quote: Don’t dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energy moving forward together towards an answer.
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: You don't need strength to let go of something. What you really need is understanding.
en_quotes.author: Guy Finley

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
en_quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

en_quotes.quote: We think that forgiveness is weakness, but it's absolutely not; it takes a very strong person to forgive.
en_quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

en_quotes.quote: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
en_quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

en_quotes.quote: The more you know yourself, the more you forgive yourself.
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Never forget that to forgive yourself is to release trapped energy that could be doing good work in the world.
en_quotes.author: D. Patrick Miller

en_quotes.quote: The burden of regret can weigh us down heavily on our spiritual journey. The best way to release regret is to forgive ourselves.
en_quotes.author: James Van Praagh

en_quotes.quote: You, Lord, are forgiving and good, abounding in love to all who call to you.
en_quotes.author: Bible

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is man’s deepest need and highest achievement.
en_quotes.author: Horace Bushnell

en_quotes.quote: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and realize that prisoner was you.
en_quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

en_quotes.quote: Yourself and welcome love back into your life.
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: Holding a grudge doesn’t make you strong; it makes you bitter. Forgiving doesn’t make you weak; it sets you free.
en_quotes.author: Dave Willis

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is for yourself because it frees you. It lets you out of that prison you put yourself in.
en_quotes.author: Louise Hay

en_quotes.quote: Do not judge, and you will not be judged. Do not condemn, and you will not be condemned. Forgive, and you will be forgiven.
en_quotes.author: Bible

en_quotes.quote: When you initially forgive, it is like letting go of a hot iron. There is initial pain and the scars will show, but you can start living again.
en_quotes.author: Stephen Richards

en_quotes.quote: You forgive yourself for every failure because you are trying to do the right thing. God knows that and you know it. Nobody else may know it.
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: There are only 2 two ways to have a peaceful conscience: Never do anything wrong or learn self-forgiveness (Pro tip: first way’s impossible)
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: Do as the heavens have done, forget your evil; With them forgive yourself.
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: It’s toughest to forgive ourselves. So it’s probably best to start with other people. It’s almost like peeling an onion. Layer by layer, forgiving others, you really do get to the point where you can forgive yourself.
en_quotes.author: Patty Duke

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr

en_quotes.quote: In the shadow of my hurt, forgiveness feels like a decision to reward my enemy. But in the shadow of the cross, forgiveness is merely a gift from one undeserving soul to the next.
en_quotes.author: Andy Stanley

en_quotes.quote: The simple truth is, we all make mistakes, and we all need forgiveness.
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: When we give ourselves self-compassion, we are opening our hearts in a way that can transform our lives.
en_quotes.author: Kristin Neff

en_quotes.quote: People can be more forgiving than you can imagine. But you have to forgive yourself. Let go of what’s bitter and move on.
en_quotes.author: Bill Cosby

en_quotes.quote: To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness.
en_quotes.author: Robert Muller

en_quotes.quote: I will permit no man to narrow and degrade my soul by making me hate him.
en_quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

en_quotes.quote: Having asked God for forgiveness, accept release, then truly forgive yourself and turn your back definitely on the matter.
en_quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

en_quotes.quote: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. Mcgill

en_quotes.quote: The only true way to create a more loving, productive, and fulfilling life is by forgiving the past.
en_quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

en_quotes.quote: Everyone makes mistakes. The wise are not people who never make mistakes, but those who forgive themselves and learn from their mistakes.
en_quotes.author: Ajahn Brahm

en_quotes.quote: I think that if God forgives us we must forgive ourselves. Otherwise, it is almost like setting up ourselves as a higher tribunal than him.
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: We all make mistakes, don’t we? But if you can’t forgive yourself, you’ll always be an exile in your own life.
en_quotes.author: Curtis Sittenfeld

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is really a gift to yourself - have the compassion to forgive others, and the courage to forgive yourself.
en_quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

en_quotes.quote: Forgiving is giving up the hope that it couldn’t have been any other way than it actually was.
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Forgive others, not because they deserve forgiveness, but because you deserve peace.
en_quotes.author: Mel Robbins

en_quotes.quote: You will have no peace until you have discovered how to forgive yourself, to forgive other people and let them forgive you.
en_quotes.author: Dorothy Rowe

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the economy of the heart...forgiveness saves the expense of anger, the cost of hatred, the waste of spirits.
en_quotes.author: Hannah More

en_quotes.quote: Without forgiveness and love, you will live with resentment, bitterness, malice and strife which result in more pain. You can never love without forgiving. Forgiveness deepens your ability to love and frees you from pain.
en_quotes.author: Kemi Sogunle

en_quotes.quote: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: The real difficulty is to overcome how you think about yourself. If we don’t have that we never grow, we never learn, and sure as hell we should never teach.
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: In order to heal, we must first forgive…and sometimes the person we must forgive is ourselves.
en_quotes.author: Mila Bron

en_quotes.quote: It is such a great moment of liberation when you learn to forgive yourself, let the burden go, and walk out into a new path of promise and possibility.
en_quotes.author: John O’Donohue

en_quotes.quote: Feeling compassion for ourselves in no way releases us from responsibility for our actions. Rather, it releases us from the self-hatred that prevents us from responding to our life with clarity and balance.
en_quotes.author: Tara Brach

en_quotes.quote: Without forgiveness life is governed by...an endless cycle of resentment and retaliation.
en_quotes.author: Roberto Assagioli

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is above all a personal choice, a decision of the heart to go against natural instinct to pay back evil with evil.
en_quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

en_quotes.quote: It’s not an easy journey, to get to a place where you forgive people. But it is such a powerful place, because it frees you.
en_quotes.author: Tyler Perry

en_quotes.quote: To err is human; to forgive, divine.
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: True forgiveness is when you can say ‘Thank you for that experience'.
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: It’s one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself, to forgive. Forgive everybody.
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love.
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Never forget the nine most important words of any family: I love you. You are beautiful. Please forgive me.
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I believe forgiveness is the best form of love in any relationship. It takes a strong person to say they’re sorry and an even stronger person to forgive.
en_quotes.author: Yolanda Hadid

en_quotes.quote: Let’s shake free this gravity of judgment, and fly high on the wings of forgiveness.
en_quotes.author: India Arie Simpson

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the needle that knows how to mend.
en_quotes.author: Jewel

en_quotes.quote: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is not weak. It takes courage to face and overcome powerful emotions.
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
en_quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

en_quotes.quote: Always forgive your enemies – nothing annoys them so much.
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness is a funny thing. It warms the heart and cools the sting.
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: Before we can forgive one another, we have to understand one another.
en_quotes.author: Emma Goldman

en_quotes.quote: Without forgiveness life is governed by an endless cycle of resentment and retaliation.
en_quotes.author: Roberto Assagioli

en_quotes.quote: The remedy for life’s broken pieces is not classes, workshops or books. Don’t try to heal the broken pieces. Just forgive.
en_quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant
